text: Join us at 1 p.m. ET this Friday, Jan. 29, for “PHA Live: COVID-19 Vaccines.” Discover what you need to know as #COVID19 vaccination begin. Victor Tapson, M.D., will answer your #pulmonaryhypertension and COVID-19 #vaccine questions. Learn more. https://t.co/6EsZYAVJ1U. #PHALive https://t.co/BMvMd38p92
